user_query: I want to track packages and fetch fleet information and logo of Singapore Airlines for a company event.

TaskList.description: Track UPS package to get its current location and delivery status.
Track USPS package for its tracking details and delivery estimation.
Track FedEx package to find out its transit and pending delivery status.
Fetch fleet information of Singapore Airlines to analyze available aircraft and services.
Fetch the logo of Singapore Airlines to use it in promotional materials for the event.
